Eating dinner
smoking  than looked up
ufo
excited

content.summary: Boomerang shape like; after 2 minutes it flashed than disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was inside the house at the kitchen table when my friend yelled at me to grab my camcorder and come outside.  across the street what seemed to be above the neighbors house was this huge fireball just hoovering there, then after a few minutes it changed to just a huge white bright light. it appeared to change shape like a liquid.  this went on for several hours.  we came back inside and turned all the lights out and noticed this faint blue thin wide light scanning the inside of my friends house. you could barely notice the scanning light until it hit your eyes, then it was as bright as a laser hitting you in the eye.  a few hours later after the sun started to come up i heard a rustling noise in the back and i saw what looked like to me a reptile looking face peeking out from behind a tree looking at us. i do have video evidence but i have no way to upload it, and i have lost the charger for the camera.  i would be more than happy to share it with you, but i have to get a charger and go through my tapes to figure out which tape it is on.  i have always been very interested in ufo's and i really wasn't scared at the time, just more curious than anything.  some of the video is taken inside the house(reptile man) but most was taken outside (ufo). my friend i was with at the time passed away about 6 months later from scleroderma. i have been wanting to share this very much but didn't know who to contact...Or trust.  if you are interested you are more than welcome to a copy of the video, but i have no idea how to do it.  my camcorder is a sony hi 8 if that matters.  hope to hear from you soon.
content.summary: Fireball at first, then bright white liquid shape changing light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to pick my daughter up from work. i had my bright lights on to see any deer ahead in the road. i was in darkness for the mile stretch that i saw the object. i saw a dim glow out my side window and that it was a patch of fog traveling with my vehicle. i estimate it was about 10 ft off the ground and about the size of my vehicle. i began to attempt to debunk it, thinking it was a reflection of the interior of the car - no. i thought the headlights were causing a reflection on area fog. no. it was too far back to be my headlights and there wasn't any fog in the area. i was on this road for exactly one mile traveling south around 40mph. i kept looking and looking at it every few seconds. i got to the corner and turned right. it was gone. nothing had changed, it was still dark and my headlights were still on bright. i kept checking out the window for most of the rest of the way to my destination but never saw it again. on the way home i took the exact same road but now traveling north. i didn't see anything and neither did my daughter, who was by then with me. i don't know if this was a ufo or something else entirely. i was unable to debunk it while it was occurring. while it was happening i felt disbelief and curiosity. no real fear. now as i sit here typing this i am shaking a little. i might have trouble sleeping. is a delayed fear reaction normal? i should have panicked while it was happening but didn't. it was so close to me too.
content.summary: A dimly glowing fog the size of a car following next to and slightly higher than my car

content.detailedDescription: We noticed a star like object, but it would circle, make straight line burst , then stop. and keep doing this for 40 minutes, then it disappeared.
content.summary: Noticed star like object, but it was circleing and making darting moves

content.detailedDescription: Same as short
content.summary: 2 white. sarlike, front more dimly lit one looked to be towing a brighter object same speed. after about 4-5 seconds tthe front one assended, stright up. when brighter one reached same spot it also went sttraight up.

content.detailedDescription:
Back in the 1979-80 time frame, while studying mechanical engineering at cal poly san luis obispo, i worked part-time as a poker dealer in a club located right on pacific coast hwy 1 in oceano, ca. through this stretch the hwy is only two lanes. the club was located on the east side of the highway and on the opposite site was a field, railroad tracks, and an area close to the road that some of the patrons would park in. the particular night in question there was a scheduled missile launch of some sort at vandenberg air force base at 10:00 pm. since the sky was clear the players at my table thought it would be fun to go across the street and watch the launch so we paused the game and all went out to watch about 5 minutes prior. as scheduled the launch went off flawlessly and we returned and continued the game. the game went on for another 4-5 hours and then broke so my shift was over. 

20 minutes later i'm driving up my driveway which is out in the woods located on carpenter canyon rd (hwy 227). the property slopes up a decent hill (maybe 400 ft elevation change from the road to the top of the hill/ridge). the driveway is surrounded with pretty high trees so you have the feeling of being in a tunnel. after 100 feet up the driveway there is a left turn which immediately opens up to a sloping field. the trailer i'm staying in is on the left about 30 feet away and the field runs up the hill about another 75 feet. at that point the hillside is covered with trees to the top and over. 

as i pull in front of our mobile home, my attention is immediately caught by a bright white light emanating out of the bottom center of a purplish glowing object hovering 20 feet above the treetops on the ridge (trees may have been 30 ft tall). the purplish object was approximately 30 -40 feet wide and 7 - 12 feet thick. the white light was about 3 feet wide and went straight down through the trees like a light tube. the object sat there for a maybe 10 seconds or so while i parked and got out of my car. then i stood there for 20 - 30 seconds staring at it when i decided to wake up my girlfriend. she came out immediately and we both watched it for several minutes longer. then it just vanished-like turning off a light. however, there was a black smoke/soot left in the sky where the purplish shape was.  
thought it was odd that i could never really made out an object, just the purplish glowing mass.

i've included a photo and added/edited the object and light beam. the photo is not of the actual location either as i've not lived in the area for some time. the second photo shows, poorly, the soot.
content.summary: Arroyo grande: bright dark purple object with white light beam

content.detailedDescription: On december the 7 ---2014 i was in my room on the computer as my mother was on the phone talking to my sister shell while sitting on the couch--when  all of a sudden i heard her say in a upset but kind of excited way i see something outside what is that----i could tell by her voice something was wrong --so i got up and went out on the front porch to see what was wrong expecting to see a rare animal or something --- when i all of a sudden looked up in the sky and saw heading towards our house the most beautiful but unusual looking lights ---they looked like  a star you could say heading towards out house radiating bright orange light --all i could say was oh my god --oh my god ---- they made no noise whatsoever --they seemed to glide almost in a graceful way --one following the other ------they stopped at the end of dartmoore rd here and turned right on glendale as if they were almost following the street ----they were no higher than i would say 50 feet in the air ---one hovered for a few seconds over us and then just slowly moved on towards broadway ---- i never in my life seen anything like this ---all i can say is they looked like bright stars ----my mom and me just stared in disbelief and awe and wonder and shock ---it was eerie in a way because all was quiet  ---they just headed off and seemed to slowly dissapear from site ----   they radiated orange light  ---beautiful --graceful how they moved very slow ----- will never forget-- we reported this to the police department not long afterwards -- i am still in shock ----
content.summary: Me and my mom watched 2 what looked like stars gracefully pass over our street radiating orange light and then slowly move on

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in my car. there is no artificial lighting on my street so what made me notice the object was the bright light. it appeared to be a shooting star type object but also looked like it was on fire. however it was too low to be a shooting star. i stopped the car and watched it cross my horizon for a second or 2. the object the stopped directly above and in front of me. after a split second it turned in the direction facing away from me and shot off into the darkness. there was no cloud cover and it just seemed to disappear into the darkness.
content.summary: A comet/ shooting star like object that stopped abruptly above me. hovered for a split second. changed direction and shot off out of site at an immense speed.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I saw 20 or more humanoid aliens in the area then the ship took off.
content.summary: Multiple aliens on ground with digging equpment, trying to find something

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:30 pm on dec 12th 2014 while driving home from the phoenix farmers market i witnessed 3 orange spheres in a triangular formation. i was traveling southbound down gilbert rd approaching the stop light at queen creek rd and the objects were to the southwest of my location.  they were solid orange and very bright.  i continued southbound on gilbert rd to ocotillo rd and they remained stationary or moved very slowly.  at 8:35 i arrived at my home near the intersection of gilbert rd and ocotillo. the neighbors across the street from my house were putting up their outdoor christmas decorations.  i pointed the lights out and they saw them too. the objects had moved southwest from the original sighting but were still clearly visible and unusually bright.  we watched them for a few minutes and i began getting things from my car. the neighbors said “the lights are gone” and a few minutes later they said “there they are again”.  i stepped out of the garage to look and snapped a photo with my phone. this time there were two of them horizontal to the ground instead of three in a triangle pattern and they stayed lit for three or four minutes until they disappeared.  i went inside and told my father in law about the sighting.  a few minutes later after getting my son ready for bed i looked out the 2nd story window. i saw that the three orange balls of light had reappeared in a straight line parallel to the ground but were further west than before.  i ran downstairs to get my father in law so he could see them and we went into our backyard for observation.  they lasted for about 10 minutes before finally disappearing.  i finished getting my son ready for bed and sat on the couch to continue looking out the window.
around 8:55 the lights reappeared and i went to get binoculars.  the binoculars didn’t help due to low magnification capability and a few minutes later all of the lights faded out.  i went back upstairs and kept an eye on the area through the window.  then at approximately 9:00 pm two lights appeared further away than before, so i went to the upstairs balcony for a different perspective.  i took a few more pictures with my phone.  this time they lasted for ten or fifteen minutes before disappearing.  at 9:25 a single light appeared in the same area so i went back out to the balcony.  the light had moved closer to my position from the last appearance but i still could not tell what it was.  while i was observing this light, two more lights which were evenly spaced appeared to the far right of the original light,  a few seconds later two more evenly spaced lights appeared to the left, and finally two more lights which were also evenly spaced appeared to the left the other four. there was a total of seven lights in a straight line. there were three sets of two lights evenly spaced from each other with the original light further to the left. they were above the height of the street lights from my point of view and above the tree line in the distance.  they lasted for a few minutes before they disappeared but i managed to take some more photos with my phone.  they all disappeared at 9:31 and i went inside. at 9:35 a helicopter flew slowly through the area. i continued to look out the window for a couple more hours but they never reappeared.
the objects appeared to be near the gila river indian community and south of the chandler municipal airport.  being a former air force security police k-9 handler and living near the municipal airport i know what planes and helicopters look like.   these objects made no sound, they did not have navigation lights, they were not chinese lanterns, or any kind of drones that i am aware of.  after doing a bit of online research i found that lights like these have been seen in this area more than once this year and sometimes they occur multiple nights in a row usually between 8:00 and 10:00. i called the chandler municipal airport and the chandler police dispatcher but they had no reports of unusual activity. i will keep an eye on the sky and maybe i will get a better glimpse of the objects next time.
content.summary: 7 fireballs in a straight line appear in chandler az 12/10/2014

content.detailedDescription: Ball of light dripping sparks over house followed by 5 fighter jets extremely low
content.summary: Orb floating over house surrounded by 5 fighter jets - orb dripping sparks

content.detailedDescription: Driving at approximately 2:35 pm on a friday in a populated area with low foot traffic. the sky was clear. a group objects in the sky caught my eye from a distance as i was driving towards them. immediately i felt the objects were unusual in their behaviour. there were maybe between 70 and 80 of them. the objects were falling and rising over each other. very dreamy in their nature. i pulled overand stopped the car to get out and get a stationary undistracted view. there were other cars driving on this otherwise normal afternoon but nobody else seemed to notice. at first i thought the objects had disappeared or that i was hallucinating them, but they had only stopped reflecting the sunlight all at the same time, and then they shifted again in unison to all reflect the sunlight. this happened a few times. they were silent. they drifted towards me and over my head until the brightness of the sun made them unobservable. i don't believe they were birds. there was no flapping of wings or any features that made me think they were a flock of birds. however a few blocks away my sister said she witnessed this highly unusual event in the daytime sky, but she thinks they were birds "playing in the wind". i really don't think they were, but i could be mistaken although i have never seen anything like it before or since.
content.summary: Observed a cluster of 70 or so objects rising & falling in the sky, in unison they would shift their angle to reflect the sunlight

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at 9pm to see if i could see any of the geminid asteroid shower.  perfectly clear night.  without obstruction in the eastern sky about 30 degrees above was a 'blinky' light we call them -- we often see these kinds of ufo lights.  this time, however, i had a binocular and focused in on it.  it was a 3d spherical object that had spoke like legs to a ring with a hub facing (forward?).  the hub blinked very brightly alternating red, blue, white.  inside the 3d sphere were seemingly random firecracker like lights going off, red and white.  the object, from our vantage point, hovered and notably gyrated up and down and to the right and left.  the longer we watched the slowly more faint and possibly farther away the ufo was.  the body of the ufo changed orientation often, at least every few minutes, the hub facing east, then northeast, then north and then northwest.  we had to often refocus the binoculars to get clarity.  we felt a photo would be worthless just showing a tiny bright dot in the sky.

across our valley to the southwest over the sheep mountains was another one of these 'blinky' like ufos, more faint and seemingly farther away.  

we often see these types of ufo lights, usually at least 2 in the same sky, at least once a week.   the most we saw in one night was in january 2009 when we saw at least 6 or 8, in addition to two brilliant ufo lights that seemingly were chased by air force jets breaking the sound barrier, the ufo's making no sound.
content.summary: 3d spherical web-like craft with dozens of blinky lights along with one very bright blinking light.

content.detailedDescription:
in retrospect, i was in the perfect "tree stand" to see it at all...On my couch watching thursday night football where, to my left, is a large picture window that has a perfect view into the eastern sky - 

weather conditions:  cool winter night...Wide open sky with blood moon...Beautiful night with a very starry sky - especially clear - 

at just over 10pm, something fell into view (from the top of the window down) out in the sky - i mentioned it to my wife and we both looked at it for approx 5 seconds until we realized it was moving - it was uncommon enough to make me get up from the football game and go out on the back deck - i did get an adrenaline surge when i realized that it was/is (its still out there by the way....) either a weather ballon strapped to the teeth with mxas lights....Or something alien to any aircraft im aware of

erratic flight path but mostly hovering...Seems to be approximately 5 miles away?.....Hard to guess - something tells me it is directly over mineral springs, nc - downtown - 

seems to be a combination of small orbs at times...Green and blue...Some red...Then gets hyper white - looked at it with a monocular (simmons) and it hard to explain what im seeing...Either the "trace" of the light in the lense (ie optical illusion) or it is indeed 3 orbs that make up 1 craft...Ostensibly anyway.

i took pictures and video which will be terrible im sure...The pictures are interesting but leave alot to speculation - i did notice that when i zoomed in on it (iphone 5s) that it appeared to "pulse" at the me through the frame (the object did) - i factored this into some type of camera/lens related issue....But this thing is up there and you wouldnt notice it unless you were on your back looking up at the stars...So im certain someone else will report!  very cool -
content.summary: Multi-colored hovering 3-part modular orb

content.detailedDescription:
Was out side on phone on balcony, when i seen a large ball of fire come up from the ground. thought it was a fireworks but no sound, i looked and noticed it was just staying there. 
started to record it and it just floated and glowed bright red orange, whole time seeming it was a fireball. then it started to float away in the distance, same level of path, blinked a couple of times and vanished.
content.summary: Ufo lewisville tx, glowing ball of fire

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the back yard about 8:10 p.M. when i saw a wierd light to the south southeast blinking through the top of the tree across the gulf coarse. i thought thats not a tower light becouse i could see the one tower red blinky light. so i got up and went around the pool and could see two more lights, two lights were even off horizon with the third down and to the right. aproximently 1 min later the lower light faded out. i went and got pops, when he got outside 2-3 mins. the third light was back. we both have binaculars and observe the lights slowly moving to the sw. observed for approxemently 10mins then the lower middle light faded quicker than before,and then the light on left went out, about 2-3 min. later the third faded. we had a wind from the sw. that night. these were going against the pervailing winds. we could not see any kind of shape or structure. wierd, thought i might tell somebody, didn't see anything on the news.
content.summary: Looked like the phoenix lights only 3 lights

content.detailedDescription: I was at home smoking a cigarette with my mother on her back porch after eating dinner. i looked up in the sky to see what appeared at first glance a flying plane. but upon further observation, i was immediately assured it wasn't. it didn't travel in a straight line. it zig-zagged. even did a loopdy-loop. all while maintaining the same radius in between 2 fixed stars. it had definite features of flapping wing like limbs. it also glowed as if on fire. my mother also confirmed it's unexpected route/path. at first, it brought deep fear with the immediate believe our galaxy was collapsing. until i gathered myself&realized it was the only one doing so. i went inside to call a fellow colleague insight of his theory's on the matter, in which he recommended i report it.
content.summary: Maintained radius, although zigzagged, looped&flapped wing like limbs

content.detailedDescription: My dad was driving and i saw in between the clouds a triangle shaped object first thought it was plane but no plane is black and huge and triangle i will do or any tests to prove i'm not lying i don't lie ever
content.summary: Triangle in sumner wa during storm

content.detailedDescription:
Enclosed just a few of many stiil and video of ufos one of wich is insane it appears that the craft are either communicating with light beams or firring at one another and in the mits of it all a much larger craft appears to side and lower flying toward the cluster of the othercraft . this went on for approximately 35 minutes to an hour . on the eve of november 23 2014 at approximately 12am.
the second video is from the eve of november 28 at 71 pm. there are 3-4 craft in this clip as well . this was following having seen a violet ring shaped craft in same part of the sky earlier that evening at 630pm. 
we have been having a crazy amount of activity here in the s.F. bay area .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: More  ufos appearring over castro valley california !!!

content.detailedDescription: It was during the earthquake which took many lives in turkey. me my mother, my grrandmother, 2 of my cousins were sitting in the balcony, while we were chatting, a ghuge sun like object came over the building in front of us, i was 7 years old at that age, and i nearly had ne recollection of what i did that day, when i told about that day to my mother she said that she remembered the object too, but when the object started moving to the sky the building trembled and the earthquake occured, the next thing i remember is running outside and than the object was gone.
content.summary: A huge fireball like object

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car with my family when my mother showed me the object howering in the night sky, the greenish, blueish, violet lights were like nothing ive ever seen before, when i looked at it, my body shivered, i had a tickling sensation and my heart started pumping faster. after that we made a turn,  and when i looked back at the object it slowly dissappeared.
content.summary: Triangle shaped howering object

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was on fort sam houston army post 1. walking our dog my wife and i.
2. looking at the hospital where i had surgery.
3. couldn't tell looked like a star.
4. well my wife and i stopped and looked it hovered there then it traveled to the west over the base it was so fast i still cant believe it i didnt say anything before because i dont want you or anyone thinking im a weirdo but my wife saw it as well. i know what i saw.
5.First didnt care but then helicopters looked for it, it looked like then i got a little worried.
6.I'm telling you it was fast the fastest.
content.summary: I have never ever seen anything that fast in my life and ive seen some fast things.

content.detailedDescription: Observed in photograph only
content.summary: Object observed in photograph only

content.detailedDescription:
13th of august 2014 - corfu

took a family photo on top of mountain. no planes or helicopters in sight as we were on the north of the island, away from the southern (only) airport. months later i discovered a strange object (as shown in the top right of the most zoomed out pic). it appeared on no other photos, suggesting it was not a problem with the camera/lens. zooming in, it appears to be a missile-like object, with a large orangey-red square above it.

i have added two zoomed in photos of the object.

would appreciate an opinions on the photo,

thanks,
       alex
content.summary: Photo of missile-like object in distance of family photo, clearly not a plane or other

content.detailedDescription: I was bringing in the xmas tree felt this weird vibe looked up there it was about 150 to 300 ft above me toward the hudson river. i noticed it cause when i was younger saw the same thing and it scared the crap out of me then cause it followed me. i have no doubt that this  ufo. it just hoovered there for about 20 min then it moved northeast very slow for another 5 min then i looked around then looked back up and it was gone. i just felt numb just dumbfounded that i was looking at this object again after 20 some years. ive talked to a few people in the hudson valley area here and im not the only one to have seen this triangle shape object before.
content.summary: Black triangle shape havent seen one since i was 11 or 12 y/o now 34y/o talked to neighbor she saw same thing by beacon newburgh bridge

content.detailedDescription:
I was checking the weather using either weather underground or weather bug website and was able to look at some local feeds of different areas to see what the current weather condition was in those areas.  upon clicking on the fox hill neighborhood camera, located in hampton virginia, i noticed something in the sky of the picture.  only a still photo is provided so i was unable to observe any details of the object in flight, pulsating, etc.

thank you,
patrick
content.summary: Still photo taken from weather camera website.

content.detailedDescription: There were 3 large lights that would appear and then fizzle out and reappear several times this lasted for about 2minutes and then they dropped what looked like sparks but seemed as is they were actually smaller versions of these orbs and actually went in hundreds of directions in pairs of 2. i also have 42 seconds of vedio footage that i can not successfully upload to the site.
content.summary: Extreme

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was at work went outside at lunch break to smoke a cigarette.I got in my jeep litmy cigarette when i noticed what i thought was a star funny because it was only star out there.T he sky was pretty clear nice full moon.I looked up again and noticed the star had moved and looked like it was twinkling.I took out my cellphone and recorded it.Later when i looked at the video you could see it changing shapes and pulsating it would be a square then a rectangle was really strange. two hours later went out the side door to throw something in the dumpster and there it was again or another one i have two different videos of it.
content.summary: Pulsating light floating above

content.detailedDescription: was in my office and around 2100 to 2200 hrs. one of my co workers said he is getting numerous face book reports on his cell phone of ufo being sighted over ruidoso new mexico.  also military jets and helicopter's in the area.  i did not personally see or hear anything nor did i receive any facebook reports about ufo activity.
content.summary: Numerous face book posting of ufos over ruidoso, new mexico

content.detailedDescription: while taking photos of street flooding ,saw what i thought was a bolt of lightning traveling down the street just over the street lights headed from north to south .A second later snapped a photo ,the light turned east towards me as it clicked photo , my cell phone snapped a picture .The light passed just three feet over my head standing on the sidewalk .As it passed me.I turned around to see it again an just above the alley power lines .A square window opened up as dark space inside it ,in the morning blue sky .I took a look at photo the next day an you can see the image of a head two arms an a torso of what we call a human . the light was about 35 feet , all i can say is its different . perhaps a time traveler .Photo has not been altered . perhaps its flash back but i didn't have the flash on . could be another dimension . i don't know how to attach photo from my cell phone . so i will wait for mufon to contact me to forward , actual photo is dated 6/26/13 time appt. 6:26 am , morning mist in air from a sever storm that just ended . streets and sidewalks are flooded .
content.summary: Light form image of torso arms an head have photo time travel
